meanings.sent1: The dalmatian had the blotchiest coat in the whole park.
meanings.sent2: Her face was the blotchiest after spending hours in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The artist's canvas looked like the blotchiest map of a colorful land.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was the blotchiest canvas, painted with stars and clouds.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a sea of flowers, each petal the blotchiest hue of pink.

meanings.definition: Having the most blotches or spots
meanings.sent1: Out of all the frogs, the one in the pond was the blotchiest.
meanings.sent2: The leopard at the zoo was the blotchiest of them all.
meanings.sent3: The cake with the most frosting was also the blotchiest in appearance.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was the blotchiest carpet of fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow was the blotchiest arc across the sky, each color distinct.
